entries.journal_entry_description: Inaldra's Lieutenant knows who on the station is looking to hire someone. Talk to her to find out what is available.
entries.journal_entry_title: Speak to Inaldra's Lieutenant to Get Work
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Inaldra's Lieutenant can send you all available jobs on the space station. Talk to her so you can learn what is available.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Talk to Inaldra's Lieutenant in Inaldra's Office
